description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a LightningJS component 'RecipesList' which manages displaying a list of recipes with search, filter, sort, pagination, and related UI components.

classes.name: RecipesList
classes.description: A Lightning component that displays a list of recipes with search, filtering, sorting, and pagination features.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads recipes based on current state parameters and updates the items and total count.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Handles search input, resets to first page, and reloads recipes.

methods.name: onFilterChange
methods.description: Handles filter changes, resets to first page, and reloads recipes.

methods.name: onSortChange
methods.description: Handles sorting changes, resets to first page, and reloads recipes.

methods.name: onPageChange
methods.description: Handles page changes and reloads recipes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the component by loading recipes upon creation.
